Name: El Murciélago
Ingredients: 60 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of lime wedge and edible orchid flower.
TOP with ginger beer and crushed ice.
Garnish with lime wedge and orchid.
History: Spanish Bacardí Legacy 2016 winning cocktail created by Angel Arruñada at Sol Y Mar Café in Fuengirola.
Nutrition: One serving of El Murciélago contains 209 calories
